tacztweaks.config.title: TaCZ Tweaks
tacztweaks.config.gun.reloadWhileShootin: Allow reloading guns immediately after shooting
tacztweaks.config.gun.allowUnload.name: Allow Unload
tacztweaks.config.gun.allowUnload.descri: Enable or disable the gun unload feature
tacztweaks.config.crawl.enabled.name: Enabled
tacztweaks.config.crawl.enabled.descript: By disabling the crawling feature completely, you can use other crawl mods to function properly with TaCZ

Change the lower pitch limit while crawling
tacztweaks.config.crawl.dynamicPitchLimi: Change the pitch limit dynamically based on block collisions
tacztweaks.config.crawl.visualTweak.name: Visual Tweak
tacztweaks.config.crawl.visualTweak.desc: Tweak the crawling animation to look more natural
Allows bullets to damage correct body parts
tacztweaks.config.compat.vsCollisionComp: Allows bullets to properly collide with Valkyrien Skies ships
tacztweaks.config.compat.vsExplosionComp: Allows explosive bullets to damage and knockback Valkyrien Skies ships
